attributes.action: Fiona Robson is unfit for her position as a Conservative Councillor
attributes.additional_details: Her views on the subject are prejudiced and follow the stereotype that many attendees of the March were 'on benefits' and also infers that many falsely claim benefits. She unprofessionally attacks constituents and members of the march and in her role should not be allowed to comment on such things. I believe she is not fit to her position as councillor with after the use of biased and stereotyped views on so many people.
attributes.background: Following the Unity march on the 4th March, Conservative councillor Fiona Robson abused her role as an MP, commenting "How many people claiming to be unfit to work were fit enough to travel to & physically MARCH around London yesterday?!” on her twitter account.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for comments made on social media by local councillors. Fiona Robson is not an MP.
